theorem P3_iff_isOpen_of_isClosed {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X}
    (hA : IsClosed (A : Set X)) :
    Topology.P3 A â†” IsOpen (A : Set X) := by
  constructor
  Â· intro hP3
    -- `P3` together with the closedness of `A` gives `A âŠ† interior A`
    have hâ‚ : (A : Set X) âŠ† interior (A : Set X) := by
      simpa [hA.closure_eq] using hP3
    -- The interior is always contained in the set
    have hâ‚‚ : interior (A : Set X) âŠ† A := interior_subset (s := A)
    -- Hence `A = interior A`, so `A` is open
    have hEq : (A : Set X) = interior A := Set.Subset.antisymm hâ‚ hâ‚‚
    have hOpenInt : IsOpen (interior (A : Set X)) := isOpen_interior
    simpa [hEq] using hOpenInt
  Â· intro hOpen
    exact Topology.P3_of_isOpen (A := A) hOpen

import Mathlib
import Aesop

theorem Topology.P3_iff_P2_of_isOpen {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X}
    (hA : IsOpen (A : Set X)) :
    Topology.P3 A â†” Topology.P2 A := by
  have hInt : interior (A : Set X) = A := hA.interior_eq
  constructor
  Â· intro hP3
    dsimp [Topology.P3] at hP3
    dsimp [Topology.P2]
    intro x hx
    have hx' : (x : X) âˆˆ interior (closure (A : Set X)) := hP3 hx
    simpa [hInt] using hx'
  Â· intro hP2
    exact Topology.P2_implies_P3 (A := A) hP2

theorem Topology.P2_iff_P1_and_P3_of_isOpen {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X}
    (hA : IsOpen (A : Set X)) :
    Topology.P2 A â†” (Topology.P1 A âˆ§ Topology.P3 A) := by
  have hâ‚ : Topology.P1 A â†” Topology.P2 A :=
    Topology.P1_iff_P2_of_isOpen (A := A) hA
  have hâ‚‚ : Topology.P3 A â†” Topology.P2 A :=
    Topology.P3_iff_P2_of_isOpen (A := A) hA
  constructor
  Â· intro hP2
    have hP1 : Topology.P1 A := hâ‚.mpr hP2
    have hP3 : Topology.P3 A := hâ‚‚.mpr hP2
    exact And.intro hP1 hP3
  Â· rintro âŸ¨hP1, _âŸ©
    exact hâ‚.mp hP1

theorem interior_closure_eq_closure_interior_closure_of_P3 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X]
    {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P3 (A : Set X) â†’
      interior (closure (A : Set X)) =
        interior (closure (interior (closure (A : Set X)))) := by
  intro hA
  have hCl :
      closure (A : Set X) =
        closure (interior (closure (A : Set X))) :=
    closure_eq_closure_interior_closure_of_P3 (A := A) hA
  simpa [hCl]

theorem P2_sUnion {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {ğ’œ : Set (Set X)}
    (hğ’œ : âˆ€ A : Set X, A âˆˆ ğ’œ â†’ Topology.P2 A) :
    Topology.P2 (â‹ƒâ‚€ ğ’œ : Set X) := by
  dsimp [Topology.P2] at hğ’œ âŠ¢
  intro x hx
  rcases Set.mem_sUnion.mp hx with âŸ¨A, hAğ’œ, hxAâŸ©
  have hx_int : (x : X) âˆˆ interior (closure (interior A)) :=
    hğ’œ A hAğ’œ hxA
  have h_subset :
      interior (closure (interior A)) âŠ†
        interior (closure (interior (â‹ƒâ‚€ ğ’œ : Set X))) := by
    have h_closure :
        closure (interior A) âŠ† closure (interior (â‹ƒâ‚€ ğ’œ : Set X)) := by
      apply closure_mono
      have h_int : interior A âŠ† interior (â‹ƒâ‚€ ğ’œ : Set X) := by
        apply interior_mono
        intro y hy
        exact Set.mem_sUnion.mpr âŸ¨A, hAğ’œ, hyâŸ©
      exact h_int
    exact interior_mono h_closure
  exact h_subset hx_int
